title: malcovi2
author: malcovi2
content: Binance released its own version of Soulbound token, The concept was discussed first by Vitalik Buterin but CZ made the first move to deploy the idea, lets see how far will this go.What is BAB token?used as proof of identity for Binance users who have completed KYC verification, on 2022-09-08 at 09:00 (UTC). Users will be able to mint BAB tokens on BNB Chain as identity credentials, and participate in building multiple projects and earn rewards.Features of the BAB Tokens:Non-transferable: Users cannot transfer BAB tokens to other users.Revocable: Users can revoke their BAB tokens.Unique: One verified Binance user ID allows the user to mint one BAB token only on a certain chain.additional info here: https://www.binance.com/en/support/announcement/0fe1e7c8781844e29f56cb674231dfd7How to mint the BAB token:https://www.binance.com/en/support/faq/bacaf9595b52440ea2b023195ba4a09ctake note: 1 BUSD is required to mint the token

comments.author: Jeger.Kiting
comments.body: The Binance Account Bound (BAB) token is the identity credential for Binance users who complete KYC verification. Several projects in the BNB Chain will introduce BAB tokens as identity credentials to their communities.This token will be unique for each user who is required to pay a gas fee of 1 BUSD. Therefore, certified Binancians can only have one BAB token in the BNB Chain. Once minted, BAB tokens will be visible in the owner's on-chain wallet address. This will be the first soul-bound token to be built on the BNB Chain as Binance seeks to improve its security system.
